comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: MetaAkita is one of the first web3 projects we collaborated with for AMA. They are currently seeking for donation on the recent flooding disaster in Akita prefecture. Letâ€™s help spread the word. Every RT helps! ğŸ™"ã€Launch of Akita-Inu Reconstruction Fund, "AIRF"ã€‘Akita Prefecture, the home of Akita-Inu, has been hit by unprecedented flood disaster, affecting the lives of thousands of households.After the internal discussion, we decided to launch "Akita-Inu Reconstruction Fund" (AIRF) of NFTs.NFT enabled us to quickly implement a highly transparent, worldwide donation system.We have listed special version of donation NFTs on Opensea with a minimum donation of 0.01 ETH (about 2,600 yen).The donated crypto will be converted to Japanese Yen and donated to Akita Prefecture by Meta Akita.Donations to the AIRF can be made here.https://opensea.io/ja/collection/akita-inu-reconstruction-fundPress Releasehttps://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000010.000109304.htmlWe appreciate your cooperations."
